listitem.para: #define STBVOX_MAKE_TEXLERP1(vert, e2, n2, w2, s2, u4, d2) STBVOX_MAKE_TEXLERP(s2, w2, d2, vert)
#define STBVOX_MAKE_TEXLERP2(vert, e2, n2, w2, s2, u4, d2) ((u2)*16 + (n2)*4 + (s2))
#define STBVOX_MAKE_FACE_MASK(e, n, w, s, u, d) ((e)+(n)*2+(w)*4+(s)*8+(u)*16+(d)*32)
#define STBVOX_MAKE_TEXLERP_FACE3(e, n, w, s, u, d) ((e)+(n)*8+(w)*64+(s)*512+(u)*4096+(d)*16384)

enum { STBVOX_UNIFORM_TYPE_none, STBVOX_UNIFORM_TYPE_sampler, STBVOX_UNIFORM_TYPE_vec2, STBVOX_UNIFORM_TYPE_vec3,
STBVOX_UNIFORM_TYPE_vec4 }

enum { STBVOX_GEOM_empty, STBVOX_GEOM_knockout, STBVOX_GEOM_solid, STBVOX_GEOM_transp,
STBVOX_GEOM_slab_upper, STBVOX_GEOM_slab_lower, STBVOX_GEOM_floor_slope_north_is_top, STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_slope_north_is_bottom,
STBVOX_GEOM_floor_slope_north_is_top_as_wall_UNIMPLEMENTED, STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_slope_north_is_bottom_as_wall_UNIMPLEMENTED, STBVOX_GEOM_crossed_pair, STBVOX_GEOM_force,
STBVOX_GEOM_floor_vheight_03 = 12, STBVOX_GEOM_floor_vheight_12, STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_vheight_03, STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_vheight_12,
STBVOX_GEOM_count }

enum { STBVOX_FACE_east, STBVOX_FACE_north, STBVOX_FACE_west, STBVOX_FACE_south,
STBVOX_FACE_up, STBVOX_FACE_down, STBVOX_FACE_count }

enum { STBVOX_TEXLERP3_0_8, STBVOX_TEXLERP3_1_8, STBVOX_TEXLERP3_2_8, STBVOX_TEXLERP3_3_8,
STBVOX_TEXLERP3_4_8, STBVOX_TEXLERP3_5_8, STBVOX_TEXLERP3_6_8, STBVOX_TEXLERP3_7_8 }

section.programlisting: 569 { // ------------------------------------------------ 570 STBVOX_UNIFORM_face_data, // n the sampler with the face texture buffer 571 STBVOX_UNIFORM_transform, // n the transform data from stbvox_get_transform 572 STBVOX_UNIFORM_tex_array, // n an array of two texture samplers containing the two texture arrays 573 STBVOX_UNIFORM_texscale, // Y a table of texture properties, see above 574 STBVOX_UNIFORM_color_table, // Y 64 vec4 RGBA values; a default palette is provided; if A > 1.0, fullbright 575 STBVOX_UNIFORM_normals, // Y Y table of normals, internal-only 576 STBVOX_UNIFORM_texgen, // Y Y table of texgen vectors, internal-only 577 STBVOX_UNIFORM_ambient, // n lighting & fog info, see above 578 STBVOX_UNIFORM_camera_pos, // Y camera position in global voxel space (for lighting & fog) 579 580 STBVOX_UNIFORM_count, 581 };

section.title: anonymous enum
section.para: Definition at line 665 of file stb_voxel_render.h.
section.programlisting: 666 { 667 STBVOX_GEOM_empty, 668 STBVOX_GEOM_knockout, // creates a hole in the mesh 669 STBVOX_GEOM_solid, 670 STBVOX_GEOM_transp, // solid geometry, but transparent contents so neighbors generate normally, unless same blocktype 671 672 // following 4 can be represented by vheight as well 673 STBVOX_GEOM_slab_upper, 674 STBVOX_GEOM_slab_lower, 675 STBVOX_GEOM_floor_slope_north_is_top, 676 STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_slope_north_is_bottom, 677 678 STBVOX_GEOM_floor_slope_north_is_top_as_wall_UNIMPLEMENTED, // same as floor_slope above, but uses wall's texture & texture projection 679 STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_slope_north_is_bottom_as_wall_UNIMPLEMENTED, 680 STBVOX_GEOM_crossed_pair, // corner-to-corner pairs, with normal vector bumped upwards 681 STBVOX_GEOM_force, // like GEOM_transp, but faces visible even if neighbor is same type, e.g. minecraft fancy leaves 682 683 // these access vheight input 684 STBVOX_GEOM_floor_vheight_03 = 12, // diagonal is SW-NE 685 STBVOX_GEOM_floor_vheight_12, // diagonal is SE-NW 686 STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_vheight_03, 687 STBVOX_GEOM_ceil_vheight_12, 688 689 STBVOX_GEOM_count, // number of geom cases 690 };
